problem_statement: We need a way to systematically evaluate proposals from multiple expert perspectives
proposed_solution: Implement a multi-persona consensus engine that evaluates proposals through specialized reviewer lenses
assumptions: LLM responses are deterministic enough with temperature control
Five personas provide sufficient coverage of concerns
Weighted scoring accurately reflects relative importance
title: Multi-Persona Consensus Engine
summary: A system for evaluating proposals through multiple expert perspectives with aggregated decision-making
raw_idea: Build a consensus engine with multiple personas
raw_expanded_proposal: Detailed expansion of the original idea with problem statement, solution, and scope
